mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT R.TTL, get_common(CARR) AS CARR, get_common(JOB) AS JOB, C.CO_NM, I.CO_IMG, R.RECRUIT_NO, K.SKILL FROM RECRUIT_ANUN R JOIN CO C ON R.ID = C.ID JOIN RECRUIT_IMAGES I ON R.RECRUIT_NO = I.RECRUIT_NO JOIN REC_RESER S ON R.RECRUIT_NO = S.RECRUIT_NO JOIN (SELECT recruit_no , LISTAGG(SKILL,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SKILL_NO) as SKILL FROM RECRUIT_SKILL GROUP BY recruit_no) k ON R.RECRUIT_NO = K.RECRUIT_NO WHERE S.RESER_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND TRUNC(sysdate) < TO_DATE(EXPR_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND R.ACCP_DT IS NOT NULL

SELECT R.TTL, C.CO_NM, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY R.ACCP_DT DESC), R.RECRUIT_NO, S.SKILL, I.CO_IMG, R.WKSITE, R.EXPR_DT FROM RECRUIT_ANUN R JOIN CO C ON R.ID = C.ID JOIN (SELECT recruit_no , LISTAGG(get_common(SKILL),',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SKILL_NO) as SKILL FROM RECRUIT_SKILL GROUP BY recruit_no) S ON S.RECRUIT_NO = R.RECRUIT_NO JOIN RECRUIT_IMAGES I ON R.RECRUIT_NO = I.RECRUIT_NO WHERE 1=1 AND ROWNUM < 5 AND TRUNC(sysdate) < TO_DATE(EXPR_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND R.ACCP_DT IS NOT NULL
